titles.title: Cave Creek Canyon Protection Act of 1993
Cave Creek Canyon Protection Act of 1993
Cave Creek Canyon Protection Act of 1993
To withdraw certain lands located in the Coronado National Forest from the mining and mineral leasing laws of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E293)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-85.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 40.

action.text: Mr. Lehman moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 103-100.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 144.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 5/11/1993--Passed House amended. Cave Creek Canyon Protection Act of 1993 - Withdraws lands within the Cave Creek Canyon Drainage in Arizona from entry, location, or patent under U.S. mining, mineral and geothermal leasing, and mineral material disposal laws.
